title: Fringe, 16th century
medium:
Medium: silk, metallic thread (gold strips wound on a silk core)
Technique: plain weave
description: Red and metallic gold fringe with a woven heading in a trellis design formed by an overlay of gold threads. Fringe over a skirt of twisted red threads.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fringe, 16th century.Medium: silk, metallic thread (gold strips wound on a silk core)
Technique: plain weave. 1905-2-168.
